Subskills.name: Devastating Snowslide
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by avalanche.

Subskills.name: Devouring Snowpour
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of avalanche.

Subskills.name: Neverending Winter
Subskills.description: Conjure a snow storm dealing damage over time on a large radius around you for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Timeless Cold
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict frostbite on hit.

Subskills.name: Colossus of Yggdrasil
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by avalanche based on your vitality.

Subskills.name: Acute Hoarfrost
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Frigid Safeguard
Subskills.description: Increases your damage reduction and armor on cast for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Snow Cataclysm
Subskills.description: Inflicts monsters with a stack of cataclysm on hit increasing the damage dealt by avalanche.

Subskills.name: Nordic Stigma
Subskills.description: Mark monsters with nordic stigma on hit causing them to be hit with lightning after a short delay.

Subskills.name: Further Collapse
Subskills.description: Chance on cast for the avalanche to echo an additional time.

Subskills.name: Mending Winter
Subskills.description: Restore a portion of your maximum life on hit.

Subskills.name: Glacial Radiance
Subskills.description: Unleash a pattern of tectonic energy on the ground dealing damage over time for an extended duration.

Subskills.name: Snowshade Bait
Subskills.description: Casting Avalanche leaves an ice clone on the target area that taunts enemies and casts shouts for a set duration.
